name: encore
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an extra song or piece of music that is performed at the end of a show because the audience shouts for it: We were shouting for an encore.as/for an encore They did a few old hits as/for an encore.

Idiom
do something for an encore
shouted by the audience at the end of a performance to get the performer to sing or play more: There were a few shouts of "Encore!" but she walked off stage.

Add to word list
Add to word list
the performance of an additional song or piece of music after a show has formally ended, or the word people sometimes call out while clapping to request this performance: The audience demanded encore after encore.
